text: Agios Ioannis (, also Άγιος Ιωάννης Λετρίνων - Agios Ioannis Letrinon) is a settlement and community in the municipality of Pyrgos, Elis, Peloponnese, Greece. It was an independent community between 1912 and 1997. The name translates as "Saint John". ==See also== *List of settlements in Elis ==External links== * Page of Agios Ioannis, Elis ==References== Category:Populated places in Elis
title: Agios Ioannis, Elis
